TEXT.TITLE: FRANKLIN PENNSYLVANIA U.S. SETS INITIAL PAYOUT
TEXT.BODY: Franklin Pennsylvania Investors U.S. Government Securities Fund Fund said its board declared an initial monthly dividend of 7.8 cts per share, payable April 30 to holders of record April 15. Reuter
